name: Sample Case 11: Military SCRA Interest Violation
description: Debt incurred before service that is charging more than 6% interest during active duty military service.
raw_text:
INSTALLMENT LOAN

Creditor: QUICK AUTO LOANS
Account Type: Installment
Status: Active

Original Amount: $15,000
Balance: $18,450
Date Opened: 05/10/2021
DOFD: 06/15/2024

Remarks: ACTIVE DUTY SERVICEMEMBER; PROTECTION APPLIED
notes: Triggers MIL1 because the balance grew from $15k to $18.4k in roughly 1.5 years from DOFD (or ~4 years total), but the implied rate exceeds the 6% SCRA cap for a servicemember on active duty.
